eu.amidst.sparklink.core.data

Class DataOnMemoryListContainerSerializable<E extends DataInstance>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.sparklink.core.data.DataOnMemoryListContainerSerializable<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataOnMemory<E>, DataStream<E>, Serializable, Iterable<E>

    public class DataOnMemoryListContainerSerializable<E extends DataInstance>
extends Object
implements DataOnMemory<E>, Serializable
    The DataOnMemoryListContainer class implements the DataOnMemory interface. It stores all the DataInstance objects in a List.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
